医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
加州大学戴维斯分校健康专家敦促制定野火防备行动计划，以支持呼吸道疾病患者加州大学戴维斯分校健康专家组成的多学科团队呼吁卫生系统制定野火防备行动计划，以支持患有呼吸道疾病的患者。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/UC-Davis-Health-experts-urge-wildfire-preparedness-action-plans-to-support-病人-with-respiratory-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/UC-Davis-Health-experts-urge-wildfire-preparedness-action-plans-to-support-病人-with-respiratory-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0613940d-db54-4f2a-93f5-1d8fc1cdf672 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 23:20:00 -0400 UC Davis Health experts urge wildfire preparedness action plans to support patients with respiratory diseases
了解老年肾衰竭患者透析的益处和风险一项新的研究表明，透析是否是肾衰竭的最佳选择，如果是，何时开始，可能值得更仔细的考虑。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Understanding-the-benefits-and-risks-of-diaanalysis-in-older-病人-with-kidney-failure.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Understanding-the-benefits-and-risks-of-diaanalysis-in-older-病人-with-kidney-failure.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ab5cf72f-a1d0-4a0c-9cd3-6f088fcf6f63 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 23:16:00 -0400 Understanding the benefits and risks of dialysis in older patients with kidney failure
新项目旨在研究两种疗法联合治疗儿童脑癌弗吉尼亚大学工程学院生物医学工程助理教授 Natasha Sheybani 将与国家儿童医院的研究人员合作，研究两种疗法联合治疗儿童脑癌。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/New-project-aims-to-study-the-combination-of-two-therapies-for-pediatric-brain-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/New-project-aims-to-study-the-combination-of-two-therapies-for-pediatric-brain-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0b511b15-6a41-488e-bc07-b224369fd6df Mon, 19 Aug 2024 23:13:32 -0400 New project aims to study the combination of two therapies for pediatric brain cancer
通过远程医疗提供的可扩展正念项目为患有慢性疼痛的退伍军人带来了希望根据今天发表在《美国医学会内科学》杂志上的新研究，通过远程医疗以可扩展的形式提供基于正念的干预措施可以改善患有慢性疼痛的退伍军人的疼痛和整体健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Scalable-mindativity-programs-delivered-via-telehealth-show-promise-for-veterans-with-chronic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Scalable-mindativity-programs-delivered-via-telehealth-show-promise-for-veterans-with-chronic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0f9ca671-5037-40e9-bab0-5f575de95ebe Mon, 19 Aug 2024 23:08:30 -0400 Scalable mindfulness programs delivered via telehealth show promise for veterans with chronic pain
临时护士人员配置部分降低了患者死亡风险的增加南安普顿大学领导的一项新研究发现，使用临时护理人员来填补轮值表只能部分地解决因人员短缺而导致的患者死亡风险增加的问题。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Temporary-nurse-staffing-partially-combats-increased-risk-of-病人-deaths.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Temporary-nurse-staffing-partially-combats-increased-risk-of-病人-deaths.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=69abe7d4-0b74-4e29-b6e6-e06c43ec4514 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 23:02:36 -0400 Temporary nurse staffing partially combats increased risk of patient deaths
加州大学旧金山分校的研究为帕金森病患者的持续护理指明了道路加州大学旧金山分校的两项新研究为通过植入设备为帕金森病患者提供全天候个性化护理指明了道路，该设备可以治疗白天的运动问题和夜间的失眠。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/UCSF-studies-point-the-way-toward-continuous-care-for-people-with-Parkinsons-disease.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/UCSF-studies-point-the-way-toward-continuous-care-for-people-with-Parkinsons-disease.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f1933405-7549-439c-acdb-388861a8195e Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:56:42 -0400 UCSF studies point the way toward continuous care for people with Parkinson's disease
从人类肠道微生物组中发现新的抗生素人类肠道平均含有大约 100 万亿个微生物，其中许多微生物不断争夺有限的资源。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Uncovering-new-antibiotics-from-the- human-gut-microbiome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Uncovering-new-antibiotics-from-the- human-gut-microbiome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=23f843ab-fc2d-4c59-8f93-8a3a548c4fba Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:44:06 -0400 Uncovering new antibiotics from the human gut microbiome
SwRI 开发了一种独特的技术来筛选新的 DNA 靶向疗法西南研究所 (SwRI) 开发了一种独特的技术来筛选新的 DNA 靶向疗法，旨在治疗癌症和其他疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/SwRI-develops-a-unique-technology-to-screen-new-DNA-targeting-therapeutics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/SwRI-develops-a-unique-technology-to-screen-new-DNA-targeting-therapeutics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=60467e0d-aaa5-4475-bb9a-28ad41c1e1a0 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:34:56 -0400 SwRI develops a unique technology to screen new DNA-targeting therapeutics
研究揭示了油酸在细菌性阴道病中恢复阴道微生物平衡的作用全球超过一半的女性患有细菌性阴道病 (BV) -；女性生殖道中自然存在的微生物不平衡 -；他们一生中至少有一次。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Study-uncovers-oleic-acids-role-in-restoring-vaginal-microbial-balance-in-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/Study-uncovers-oleic-acids-role-in-restoring-vaginal-microbial-balance-in-bacterial-vaginosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=371f862d-d9cc-4d12-9409-1a1956430da0 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 22:31:27 -0400 Study uncovers oleic acid's role in restoring vaginal microbial balance in bacterial vaginosis
肠道屏障在结直肠癌预后中发挥关键作用2024 年 8 月 14 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新综述，题为“肠道屏障作为结直肠癌治疗的看门人”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/The-gut-barrier-plays-key-role-in-colorectal-cancer-prognosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240819/The-gut-barrier-plays-key-role-in-colorectal-cancer-prognosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1a870ccf-1b01-4498-9c0b-cec2d050a530 Mon, 19 Aug 2024 21:30:21 -0400 The gut barrier plays key role in colorectal cancer prognosis
